properties.body:
GULF OF GUINEA.
SAO TOME AND PRINCIPE.
DNC 01.
1. M/V ATTACKED IN 02-44N 006-24E AT 291640Z DEC.
   VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP CLEAR OF THIS
   POSITION AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION.
   REPORTS TO NAVAREA II,
   PHONE: 332 9822 8888, 332 5631 2424,
   FAX: 332 5631 2584,
   E-MAIL: WATCHKEEPERS@MDAT-GOG.ORG,
   COORD.NAVAREA2@SHOM.FR.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 052058Z JAN 21.
